backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (Product, Order, Category, etc.) and stable storage maps for an e-commerce jewellery platform with authorization, blob storage, Stripe, and HTTP outcall mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (label renames, animations, footer color, layout changes) to their affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary document describing the purpose and recent changes of each frontend source file across pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Aurelie Fine Jewellery React app, mounting the app at #root and loading the main TSX entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application file that configures TanStack Router with all lazy-loaded routes (including gender-specific home pages and boys/girls category pages), sets up React Query, and handles profile setup modal display after login.
frontend/src/components/admin/BannerMana: An admin component for managing scrolling banner messages, supporting add, update, toggle enabled/disabled, delete, and reorder operations via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/BoysHeader: An admin component for managing Boys section category navigation headers, allowing image upload with progress tracking and redirect URL configuration per category slug.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin component for managing up to 5 homepage carousel slides, supporting image upload with optimization, URL editing, reordering, and toggling slide visibility.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Admin component for managing category-specific carousel images (up to 5) and redirect URLs, supporting image upload, reordering, removal, and saving via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryIm: Reusable admin component for managing up to 10 category images with support for upload, removal, reordering, and setting a primary thumbnail image.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeaderCate: Admin component for managing header navigation category entries, allowing image upload and redirect URL configuration per product category slug.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin component that lists customer inquiries with their status and allows admins to submit text responses to pending inquiries.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin component that displays all orders with status badges, allows admins to update order statuses via a dropdown, and provides a styled print view for individual orders.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal dialog for creating or editing a product, handling fields like name, price, category, gender, and media uploads (images/video) with optimization before submission.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin panel component that lists all products with thumbnails and prices, and provides buttons to add, edit, or delete products using a form modal and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin form component for editing and saving site-wide content such as contact info, social media URLs, and static text pages like privacy policy and terms of service.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Reusable carousel component that fetches and displays enabled, ordered slides for a given category with auto-rotation, hover pause, navigation arrows, and dot indicators.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: A reusable image carousel component for product categories that auto-rotates slides, supports click-through redirects, and shows a skeleton loader while fetching images via category-specific hooks.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CouponC: Checkout component that lets users enter and apply a coupon code with inline validation, displaying a success state with a remove option when a valid coupon is applied.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiQrCo: Checkout payment component that generates and displays a UPI QR code image via an external API and provides a button to copy the UPI URI to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: A simple wrapper component that adds a `data-customer-page` attribute to scope styles for customer-facing pages.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Renders the site footer with logo, contact info, policy links, and social media icons, pulling dynamic content from the `useGetSiteContent` hook.
frontend/src/components/GenderCategoryTa: Renders 'For Him' and 'For Her' navigation tabs that route to `/boys` and `/girls` respectively, hidden on admin routes.
frontend/src/components/HeaderCategoryNa: Displays a horizontal scrollable row of product category icons with circular images fetched from the backend, supporting configurable redirect URLs on click.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: A full-width home page hero carousel that fetches enabled slides, auto-rotates with directional slide transitions, and supports click-through URL redirects.
frontend/src/components/HomeCategoryCaro: Renders a section on the home page that iterates over all product categories and displays two `CategoryImageCarousel` instances per category.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main application layout providing a sticky header with logo, cart icon with item count, authenticated user dropdown (with admin link), gender tabs, and a footer with marquee banner.
frontend/src/components/MarqueeBanner.ts: Displays a continuously scrolling marquee banner with enabled promotional messages fetched from the backend, styled with a gold gradient.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: A modal dialog component that displays full order details including status, items, and pricing, and allows users to cancel an order by selecting a reason from a predefined list.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: A carousel component that displays product images and an optional video with navigation arrows and dot indicators, supporting lazy loading for non-adjacent slides.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal form that collects new user profile information (name, email, phone, address) and saves it via the actor, granting admin access if a specific email is used.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: A skeleton placeholder component shown while lazy-loaded route components are being fetched, rendering header and card grid skeletons.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: A full-screen splash screen that displays the Aurelie logo and brand name with a zoom animation, then calls an onComplete callback after 1.5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Sets `data-admin-ui="true"` on `document.body` while the admin route is mounted so Radix portal components inherit admin-scoped styles.
frontend/src/hooks/useBannerQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all or only enabled banner messages and mutations for adding, updating, and deleting them via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store with localStorage persistence that manages cart items, including add, remove, update quantity, clear, and total price/count helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: React Query hooks for reading and updating per-category carousel images and redirect URLs via the backend actor.
React Query hooks for fetching all or a single category header and a mutation for setting a category header via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook that always returns the `'split'` footer variant with no state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage ICP AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks covering user profiles, admin checks, categories, homepage carousel slides, products, orders, and site content via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, Aurelie brand colors, and custom utility classes/animations for luxury UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page for viewing and managing all orders with filtering by date range or month/year, order status updates, and detailed order inspection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CategoryEditPag: Admin page for editing an existing category, allowing updates to name, description, display order, and images with admin-only access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that checks caller admin status and renders tabbed management sections for products, orders, inquiries, site content, carousels, banners, and category navigation.
frontend/src/pages/BoysHomePage.tsx: Boys/men's category home page that displays animated category circles fetched from category headers, navigating to sub-category routes or redirect URLs on click.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with quantity controls and removal, shows a total price, and requires authentication to view.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Category page for Anklets, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'anklets' slug and relevant description.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysB: Category page for Boys Bracelet, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-bracelet' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysC: Category page for Boys Chains, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-chains' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysL: Category page for Boys Lab Diamonds, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-lab-diamonds' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysR: Category page for Boys Rings, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-rings' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Category page for Bridal Jewellery, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'bridal-jewellery' slug.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty placeholder file for a category-not-found page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Reusable template component that displays a category header and product grid, supporting optional gender filtering, add-to-cart, and buy-now actions.
frontend/src/pages/categories/EarringsPa: Category page for Earrings, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'earrings' slug.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Category page for Lab Grown Diamonds Jewellery, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'lab-diamonds-jewellery' slug.
frontend/src/pages/categories/NecklacePa: Category page for Necklaces, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'necklace' slug.
Category page for Rings, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'rings' slug.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Two-step checkout page (address then payment) that pre-fills user profile data, supports coupon codes, computes discounted totals, and generates UPI payment URIs for order creation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: A contact form page that allows authenticated users to submit customer inquiries (name, email, message) to the backend, showing a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: A customer dashboard page displaying order history and inquiries in tabs, with order status icons, INR formatting, and a clickable order detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/GirlsHomePage.tsx: A landing page for the women's jewellery section showing animated category circles fetched from backend headers, with a hero banner and category navigation bar.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main homepage rendering a hero carousel, category carousels section, and a product grid with add-to-cart and buy-now actions.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: A page listing the authenticated customer's orders with status badges, formatted dates and prices, and a modal for order details.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: A simple payment failure screen with an error icon and buttons to return to the cart or navigate back to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success confirmation page with order details and next steps, providing navigation buttons to the dashboard or home page.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the site's privacy policy content from the backend, showing a loading spinner while data is being retrieved.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Displays a filtered grid of products for a given category slug, with add-to-cart and buy-now actions requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single product including a media carousel, price, stock status, and quantity-based add-to-cart/buy-now controls.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileDetailsPage.ts: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their personal profile information (name, email, phone, address, DOB) with save validation.
frontend/src/pages/ShippingPolicyPage.ts: Fetches and displays the site's shipping policy content from the backend, showing a loading spinner while data is being retrieved.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Fetches and displays the site's terms and conditions content from the backend, showing a loading spinner while data is being retrieved.
frontend/src/utils/device.ts: Utility that detects whether the user is on a mobile device using the modern navigator.userAgentData API with a user-agent string fallback.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Client-side utilities to resize and compress images via canvas before upload, and a passthrough helper for video files.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Centralized pricing utilities for computing cart subtotals, validating the 'AFJ10' coupon for a 10% discount, and formatting amounts in INR.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines and exports all product category metadata (slugs, titles, descriptions, gender) for both girls and boys, with lookup and options helper functions.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Utilities for generating UPI deep-link URIs for payment, including generic UPI, Google Pay, and PhonePe links pre-configured for Aurelie Fine Jewellery.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom color palette (navy, gold, beige, silver, etc. using OKLCH), extended border radius, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for 'Aurelie Fine Jewellery' e-commerce app, tracking existing features (label renames, animations, footer color, category section relocation) and pending feature requests.
